nodes.text: Riorians were an insectoid sentient species native to the planet Rior. They were characterized by their large, red eyes and sensitive hearing. While most were peaceful, a maniacal male Riorian known as Stalnus was wanted for murder by the New Republic by the year 7 ABY. In addition, at least one Riorian was a member of the Karazak Slavers Cooperative.

While Leland Chee, keeper of the Holocron continuity database, initially confirmed that Loje Nella was a Riorian, he later debated whether this was truly accurate and said that the identity of her species should be determined in a future source. Ultimately, The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, a three-volume encyclopedia edited by Bob Vitas and released on December 9, 2008, confirmed that Nella was an "intelligent cliff-borer worm."
